old:
うっ――！
マスター、どうか私にチャンスを――！
new:
Ugh!
Master, please give me a chance!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
おぉ！　お目にかかれて光栄です！
覚者様！！
new: Oh! I am honored to meet you, Arisen!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
覚者様！　どうか我がマスターに！
私に活躍の機会を！
new:
Arisen! Please be my master! 
Give me an opportunity to flourish!
speaker: Active Pawn

old: 忠誠の心なら、誰にも負けません！
new:
If the loyalty of the heart is tested,
I will not lose to anyone!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
粉骨砕身！
いかなる困難にも、共に立ち向かう所存！
new:
Do your best!
No matter what the difficulties, we'll face them together!
speaker: Active Pawn

old: 準備万端、何でもやりますよ！
new: Ready to go, I will do anything!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
マスター！
さぁ！！　何でもお言いつけください！
new:
Master! 
Come on!! Please say anything!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
冒険の際はぜひお伴を！
作りたいものがあれば、何でもご要望を！
new:
Please come along when you are on an adventure!
If there is something you want to make, request anything!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
クラフト作業は順調です、マスター！
ご安心を！
new:
Crafting is going well, Master!
Do not worry!
speaker: Active Pawn

old: 気合い十分で作業にかかっています！
new: It will take plenty of work and fighting spirit!
speaker: Active Pawn

old: 心配は要りません、完了まで万事お任せを！
new: Do not worry, leave it to me to complete it!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
うおおお、マスター！
救って頂き面目次第もありません！！
new:
Uoooh, Master!
I have no idea how to save you!!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
マスター！！
くううっ――！　必ずやこのご恩に報います！
new:
Master!!
Wow~! This kindness will surely be repaid!
speaker: Active Pawn

old:
異界の狭間に、わざわざ私などのために――！
我がマスターはなんと慈悲深い方だ――！
一層励み、お守りしなければ――
new:
In the Rift, my Master went out of their way just for someone like me!
How kind and merciful they are!
I must work even harder and protect them...
speaker: Active Pawn
